dcterms:creator: D. M. Blei
A. Y. Ng
M. I. Jordan
dcterms:description: A popular corpus for machine learning on text, containing 11,313 documents posted to one of twenty possible newsgroups. The dataset is preprocessed to remove infrequent tokens and irrelevant content.
dcterms:title: Twenty Newsgroups

dcterms:creator: D. M. Blei
A. Y. Ng
M. I. Jordan
dcterms:description: A very large corpus of comments from Hacker News, where each document is composed of all comments posted to a single article. The dataset focuses on technology and entrepreneurship.
dcterms:title: Hacker News Comments
